Datasets

The projects of the Ideation & Prototyping Labs often make use of open data. On this data portal we are providing transformed, enriched and combined datasets. Berlin's original open data is provided through the open data sites daten.berlin.de, FIS Broker , Gesundheits- und Sozialinformationssystem (GSI) as well as Amt für Statistik Berlin-Brandenburg .
